title: Cars That Watch Their Drivers Could Reteach the World to Drive
description: Automakers are adding cameras and algorithms that monitor and nudge drivers to improve safety and ensure people supervise automated driving aids.

title: Welcome to the Comfy Office of the Future
description: To lure back workers and compete with the convenience of home, companies are offering more substantial perks and giving architects freedom to experiment.

title: In Ukraine, Crypto Finds a Purpose
description: The UN’s refugee agency has partnered with blockchain and money transfer companies to get vital aid to people displaced by conflict.

title: Wine, Skiing, and Loans: How Silicon Valley Bank Became Startups’ Best Friend
description: Founders and investors say the bank opened doors—and offered perks—no other bank would. Now companies may face a funding gap.
